trans-unit.source: Contains a default <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> for each <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to use.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to use in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to use with the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to use.
Gets or sets a value that is used for code persistence.
A user should not call <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettingCollectionString%2A> directly.
A value that is used for code persistence.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> for each <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> for each `DataTable`.
Occurs after a row is added to or deleted from a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager.ListChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Raises a <xref href="System.Data.DataRelationCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when a <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> is added to or removed from the <xref href="System.Data.DataRelationCollection"></xref>.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.

Raises a <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> is added to or removed from the <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"></xref>.
The source of the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at a particular <xref href="System.Array"></xref> index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.Count"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.Count"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
Adds an item to the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Clear"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> contains a specific value.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
Inserts an item to the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
Removes the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> item at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the item to remove.
Adds the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to the indexes used for searching.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to add to the indexes used for searching.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowEdit"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowEdit"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowNew"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AllowRemove"></xref>.
Sorts the list based on a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to sort by.
One of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection"></xref> values.
Returns the index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to search on.
The value of the property parameter to search for.
The index of the row that has the given <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.IsSorted"></xref>.
Removes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> from the indexes used for searching.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to remove from the indexes used for searching.
Removes any sort applied using <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ApplySort(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsChangeNotification"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSearching"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SupportsSorting"></xref>.
Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface.
An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects to find in the collection as bindable.
This can be `null`.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties on each item used to bind data.
Returns the name of the list.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface.
An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects, for which the list name is returned.
This can be `null`.
The name of the list.
